  "title": "Customer Support - Quality Assurance",
  "description": "LemFi (Series B) is building the go-to financial app for the Global South.&nbsp;Moving to a new country shouldn&rsquo;t mean starting from zero. That&#39;s why our&nbsp;team of 400+&nbsp;spanning&nbsp;20+ countries&nbsp;is building a financial ecosystem that helps immigrants stay connected to home, build stability, and create wealth regardless of where they are from or where they live.

What began as fast, affordable remittances is now evolving into a complete platform for multi-currency accounts, payments, credit, and long-term financial growth.&nbsp;With over&nbsp;2 million users&nbsp;across the globe, we process over&nbsp;$1.5B in monthly transactions&nbsp;to&nbsp;30+ countries, proving that borders shouldn&#39;t limit financial opportunity.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Support - Quality Assurance

Job Location:&nbsp;Remote
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a Customer Support Quality Assurance Associate to ensure consistent, high-quality customer interactions by monitoring, auditing, and evaluating support performance against company standards.
	This role is responsible for identifying gaps, driving improvements, and maintaining compliance to enhance customer satisfaction and overall service excellence.


Responsibilities


	Evaluate agent performance using established quality frameworks and scoring models.
	Identify service gaps, risks, and non-compliance trends through regular audits.
	Deliver actionable feedback and quality insights to support teams and leadership.
	Ensure consistency in customer experience, tone, and resolution quality.
	Track, analyze, and report on quality metrics and audit findings.
	Support continuous improvement initiatives to enhance customer satisfaction.
	Maintain comprehensive documentation, audit records, and quality guidelines.
	Prepare ad hoc reports as requested by Management and the Operations team.
	Provide Management with feedback on areas for improvement to enhance service delivery.
	Monitor and audit customer support interactions across all channels to ensure adherence to service quality standards.


Requirements&nbsp;


	Tertiary education in Marketing, Communications, Business Management, or a related field is preferred.
	3+ years of experience in customer service, quality assurance, or a related support role.
	Prior experience in Fintech or Financial Services is a strong advantage, particularly in regulated or high-trust environments.
	Comfortable using Google Workspace and CRM platforms, with the ability to learn new tools quickly.
	Excellent communication, empathy, problem-solving, and collaboration skills.
	A self-starter who can work independently, manage priorities effectively, and consistently deliver high-quality work across multiple tasks and deadlines.


Who You Are:


	This role requires employees to have a solid understanding of all processes carried out by the Customer Support department.
	Employees must demonstrate emotional intelligence and professionalism when providing constructive performance feedback to support team members.
	Strong written, verbal, and nonverbal communication skills, along with keen attention to detail, are essential.
	Employees should possess problem-solving abilities to develop effective strategies for improving service quality.
	Additionally, the role requires individuals to be both goal-oriented and results-driven.


Note
The Interview Process:


	Talent Screen (30 mins)
	Final interview (Task Presentation and behavioural) with the Hiring Team (30mins).

Customer Support - Quality Assurance Job at LemFi (Series B)




        
    

        
        LemFi (Series B) is building the go-to financial app for the Global South. Moving to a new country shouldn’t mean starting from zero. That's why our team of 400+ spanning 20+ countries is building a financial ecosystem that helps immigrants stay connected to home, build stability, and create wealth regardless of where they are from or where they live.

What began as fast, affordable remittances is now evolving into a complete platform for multi-currency accounts, payments, credit, and long-term financial growth. With over 2 million users across the globe, we process over $1.5B in monthly transactions to 30+ countries, proving that borders shouldn't limit financial opportunity.
     

            
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Support - Quality Assurance

Job Location: Remote
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a Customer Support Quality Assurance Associate to ensure consistent, high-quality customer interactions by monitoring, auditing, and evaluating support performance against company standards.
	This role is responsible for identifying gaps, driving improvements, and maintaining compliance to enhance customer satisfaction and overall service excellence.


Responsibilities


	Evaluate agent performance using established quality frameworks and scoring models.
	Identify service gaps, risks, and non-compliance trends through regular audits.
	Deliver actionable feedback and quality insights to support teams and leadership.
	Ensure consistency in customer experience, tone, and resolution quality.
	Track, analyze, and report on quality metrics and audit findings.
	Support continuous improvement initiatives to enhance customer satisfaction.
	Maintain comprehensive documentation, audit records, and quality guidelines.
	Prepare ad hoc reports as requested by Management and the Operations team.
	Provide Management with feedback on areas for improvement to enhance service delivery.
	Monitor and audit customer support interactions across all channels to ensure adherence to service quality standards.


Requirements 


	Tertiary education in Marketing, Communications, Business Management, or a related field is preferred.
	3+ years of experience in customer service, quality assurance, or a related support role.
	Prior experience in Fintech or Financial Services is a strong advantage, particularly in regulated or high-trust environments.
	Comfortable using Google Workspace and CRM platforms, with the ability to learn new tools quickly.
	Excellent communication, empathy, problem-solving, and collaboration skills.
	A self-starter who can work independently, manage priorities effectively, and consistently deliver high-quality work across multiple tasks and deadlines.


Who You Are:


	This role requires employees to have a solid understanding of all processes carried out by the Customer Support department.
	Employees must demonstrate emotional intelligence and professionalism when providing constructive performance feedback to support team members.
	Strong written, verbal, and nonverbal communication skills, along with keen attention to detail, are essential.
	Employees should possess problem-solving abilities to develop effective strategies for improving service quality.
	Additionally, the role requires individuals to be both goal-oriented and results-driven.


Note
The Interview Process:


	Talent Screen (30 mins)
	Final interview (Task Presentation and behavioural) with the Hiring Team (30mins).

Marketing Officer Job at Stellar International Company Limited




        
    

        
        Stellar International Company is a subsidiary of RSIN Group which entered Africa in 2008. Stellar International Co. Ltd has three businesses, namely Recycling Ant, Ant Express and Antshop Online.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Marketing Officer

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

            
    




	Coordinate the overall strategy of the purchasing department, formulate purchasing plan and budget, and optimise the supplier resource pool.
	Performing all procurement activities including pre-qualification, negotiating supplier agreements, preparation of contracts and tender management
	Leading bulk purchase negotiation, ensuring supply chain stability and cost control.
	Delegating tasks and supervising the work of Purchasing
	Identifying emerging markets to find new opportunities
	Document and report on daily operations and production metrics
	Supervise the operation of the business team and dispatching team (customer maintenance, procurement negotiation, fleet dispatching).


Requirements


	Must have a cognate experience in procuring PET Bottles (at least 3 years)
	Must have worked or have experience in a recycling company.


Benefits


	Salary: N80,000 monthly
	Transportation: N3,000 daily.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: Stellarinternationalhr@gmail.com cc: isreal@hengxingcompany.com using the Job Position and location as the subject of the mail.

  "title": "Human Resources Business Partner (HRBP) Specialist",
  "description": "PalmPay is an Africa-focused fintech firm, launched in 2019. PalmPay is a mobile payments platform that offers a number of financial services.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Human Resources Business Partner (HRBP) Specialist

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos

Job Summary


	The Human Resources Business Partner (HRBP) Specialist partners with business leaders to align HR strategies with organizational goals, providing strategic and operational HR support to drive performance, employee engagement, and compliance.


Key Responsibilities


	Partner with business leaders to deliver effective HR solutions aligned with business objectives.
